meta_title: Depreciated Meaning in 2026: Bridging Finance and Maintenance

title: Depreciated Meaning: The Definitive Guide to Asset Lifecycle Management in 2026

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern but active manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers and maintenance managers (men and women, various ethnicities) are wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. They are looking confidently at a large industrial machine (like a compressor or conveyor system). One person is holding a tablet (back of tablet visible only) as if checking data. The lighting is dramatic, highlighting the texture of the industrial equipment while keeping the atmosphere professional and clean. No text or overlays in the image. The scene conveys control, intelligence, and industrial longevity.
